company: Soil and Water Conservation Research Institute Chakwal
summary: I am involved in research activities related to on farm water conservation, enhancing soil health and fertility and enabling local farmers especially thefemale farmers to carry out Kitchen gardening to help improve their livelihoods and food security. Other than research trails I am an integral part of different International projects namely Watershed Rehabilitation and Irrigation Improvement and Improving Soil Health and Fertility using the best management practices in Pakistan. Both the projects were conducted in collaboration with United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) and International Center for Agriculture Research in Dry Areas (ICARDA)
